member.name: M:TimeLog.TLP.WebAppCode.Service.GetCustomerCommentsRaw(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.DateTime,System.DateTime)
member.summary: Get list of comments associated to a particular customer with specified
member.param: Timelog API site code
API user ID
API user password
Customer ID of customer to list all associated comments or pass 0 to query from all customer
Customer statusID, or 0 to list accross all customer status
Account manager ID, or 0 to list accross all account managers
Starting date to search comments from, or default Date value to list all comments without from constraint
Starting date to search comments to, or default Date value to list all comments without to constraint
member.returns: XML documents listing out all comments as per specified parameter
member.remarks: The result comment is sort by customer name, then by newest comment first to oldest comment last.
